name: On Running Shorts - Women's
description:
Run and sweat to your heart's content in light fast shorts. Highly wicking material and a comfortable inner brief ensure a distraction-free run.Lightweight nylon outer short is quick to dry.Recycled nylon inner brief with a high elastane content provides plenty of stretch.Silicone gripper elastic prevents riding up.Rear pocket panel stores essentials.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}








                      Recycled content
